author: lp0147
content: <@!291925846556540928> is there a date for "official" testnet launch ?

author: djrtwo
content:
No
Clients are upgrading BLS and a number of other things with the v0.12 release. Before some sort of coordinated/public testnet, we'll need to run smaller experiments with the v0.12 clients. Success in this will lead to a larger coordinated public net
